content: the double double_crochet blanket is a beginner-friendly striped throw made entirely of double_crochet stitches available in eight sizes from baby blanket to large throw a free version of the pattern are available here https //www youshouldcraft com/double-crochet-blanket-pattern **materials ** 387 - 2889 yards of brava bulky or similar #5 bulky weight yarn 8 0 mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors note the sample photos use brava bulky yarn in white cornflower sky and peacock **share your double double_crochet blankets ** if you crochet the double double_crochet blanket please share it with me on instagram tag me @youshouldcraft or use hashtag #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories disclaimer you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
